005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.InternalModelSource;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.StaticContextSource;
011
012import java.net.URI;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
016
017/**
018 * A descriptor that identifies where a given constraint was defined.
019 */
020public interface ISource {
021  enum SourceType {
022    /**
023     * A constraint embedded in a model.
024     */
025    MODEL,
026    /**
027     * A constraint defined externally from a model.
028     */
029    EXTERNAL;
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * Get the descriptor for a
034   * {@link gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource.SourceType#MODEL}
035   * source with as associated resource.
036   *
037   * @param module
038   *          the Metaschema module the constraint was defined in
039   * @return the source descriptor
040   * @since 2.0.0
041   */
042  @NonNull
043  static ISource moduleSource(@NonNull IModule module) {
044    return InternalModelSource.instance(module);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Get the descriptor for a
049   * {@link gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource.SourceType#EXTERNAL}
050   * source with as associated resource.
051   * <p>
052   * The provided static context idenfies the location of this source based on the
053   * {@link StaticContext#getBaseUri()} method.
054   *
055   * @param staticContext
056   *          the static Metapath context to use for compiling Metapath
057   *          expressions in this source
058   *
059   * @return the source descriptor
060   */
061  @NonNull
062  static ISource externalSource(@NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
063    if (staticContext.getBaseUri() == null) {
064      throw new IllegalArgumentException("The static content must define a baseUri identifing the source resource.");
065    }
066    return StaticContextSource.instance(staticContext);
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Get the type of source.
071   *
072   * @return the type
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  ISource.SourceType getSourceType();
076
077  /**
078   * Get the resource where the constraint was defined, if known.
079   *
080   * @return the resource or {@code null} if the resource is not known
081   */
082  @Nullable
083  URI getSource();
084
085  /**
086   * Get the static Metapath context to use when compiling Metapath expressions.
087   *
088   * @return the static Metapath context
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  StaticContext getStaticContext();
092}
